brief: A comprehensive application tailored for the SDPs at ASCO Power Technologies (a Schneider Electric company), designed to facilitate knowledge acquisition and information access.
Your gateway to booking a luxurious stay at a private home, where you can experience comfort and relaxation like never before.
A versatile application for jotting down and saving your notes, ensuring that your important thoughts and ideas are never lost.
Discover the world of cinema with ease. This app empowers you to access information on your favorite movies, check nearby theaters, and access showtime schedules.
Stay organized and plan your meals efficiently with the Mealy App. Simplify your weekly meal scheduling for a stress-free dining experience.
Experience real-time weather updates for major and minor cities with this weather dashboard, powered by a third-party API.
Explore a beautifully designed portfolio created using HTML and CSS, showcasing a range of skills and projects. first portfolio ever made!
An essential tool for generating strong, randomized passwords. Ideal for employees seeking secure password creation.
Test your knowledge with a timed quiz, save your score, and challenge yourself while brushing up on web development trivia.
Simplify your day with this user-friendly calendar app. Plan and save events for each working hour from 9 am to 5 pm, boosting your productivity.
